cards.name: Photon Blast
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Exhaust a card in your hand.
Increase this card's damage by 8 times its cost.
If this card is Exhausted, deal !quantum! damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Photon Blast+
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Exhaust 2 cards in your hand.
Increase this card's damage by 8 times their costs.
If this card is Exhausted, deal !quantum! damage to ALL enemies.

relics.name: Long-Range Scanner
relics.flavorText: This device's design suggests potentially interstellar range.

relics.name: Plasma Fairy
relics.description: At the start of combat, shuffle a Plasma Wisp+ into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: It seems to want your attention.

relics.name: Time Capsule
relics.description: At the end of your turn, Provision 1 card.
relics.flavorText: ERROR: Matter collection procedure cannot terminate.

relics.name: Weapon Pre-Loader
relics.description: The first Attack you draw each turn costs 0 until played.
relics.flavorText: Weapon preignition complete. Welcome back, operator.

relics.name: Absolute Terror
relics.description: The first time you end your turn after playing 0 or 1 cards, gain 40 Block.

relics.name: Phase Crystal
relics.description: Whenever your Stealth is removed, gain 3 Strength this turn.
relics.flavorText: This crystal shard polarizes the temperature on each of its facets.

relics.name: Stellar Engine
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Whenever you play a Power, all enemies gain 3 Block at the end of each of their turns.
relics.flavorText: The light seeping from the miniature star within empowers everything it touches.

relics.name: The Unseen
relics.description:
Replaces Stealth System.
Every 2 turns, gain 1 Stealth.

relics.name: Repair Arm
relics.description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, convert Gold into HP until you are fully healed.
relics.flavorText: This automated construction arm cannot be controlled.

keywords.name: Thefirefly:paradox
keywords.description: Paradoxes are 0 cost Skill cards that apply Unreality to enemies and you, then draw a card.

keywords.name: Thefirefly:plasma wisp
keywords.description: Plasma Wisps are 1 cost Ethereal Attack cards.

keywords.name: Thefirefly:precision
keywords.description: Increases the damage of your next Attack by 20% per stack. Reduced by 1 whenever a non-Attack card is played.

keywords.name: Thefirefly:provision
keywords.description: Shuffle a card from your hand into your draw pile.

keywords.name: Thefirefly:retrieve
keywords.description: Return a card from your discard pile to your hand.

keywords.name: Thefirefly:stealth
keywords.description: Halves incoming damage. Lose 1 Stealth at the end of your turn and when playing an Attack.

keywords.name: Thefirefly:unreality
keywords.description: Reduces Max HP while applied. Your Unreality is removed at the end of combat.
